Verses: 1 aththarunaththile Anegamaayiram Janangal Oruvarai Oruvar Midhikkaththakkathaagak Koodivandhirukkaiyil, Avar Mudhalaavadhu Thammudaiya Seesharai Nokki: Neengal Maayamaagiya Pariseyarudaiya Puliththamaavaikkuriththu Echcharikkaiyaayirungal.
2 veliyaakkappadaadha Maraiporulumillai, Ariyappadaadha Ragasiyamumillai.
3 aadhalaal, Neengal Irulile Pesinadhu Edhuvo, Adhu Velichchaththile Ketkappadum; Neengal Araigalil Kaadhile Sonnadhu Edhuvo, Adhu Veedugalinmel Koorappadum.
4 en Sinegidharaagiya Ungalukku Naan Sollugiren: Sareeraththaik Kolaiseydhu, Adhanpinbu Adhigamaaga Ondrum Seyyath Thiraaniyillaadhavargalukkup Payappadaadhirungal.
5 neengal Innaarukkup Bayappadavendumendru Ungalukkuk Kaanpikkiren: Kolaiseydhapinbu Naragaththile Thalla Vallamaiyullavarukkup Bayappadungal; Aam, Avarukke Bayappadungalendru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.
6 irandu Kaasukku Aindhu Adaikkalaan Kuruvigalai Virkiraargalallavaa? Avaigalil Ondraagilum Dhevanaal Marakkappadugiradhillai.
7 ungal Thalaiyilulla Mayirellaam Ennappattirukkiradhu, Aagaiyaal Bayappadaadhirungal, Anegam Adaikkalaan Kuruvigalaippaarkkilum Neengal Viseshiththavargalaayirukkireergal.
8 andriyum Naan Ungalukkuch Sollugiren: Manushar Munbaaga Ennai Arikkaipannugiravan Evano Avanai Manushakumaaranum Dhevadhoodhar Munbaaga Arikkaipannuvaar.
9 manushar Munbaaga Ennai Marudhalikkiravan Dhevadhoodhar Munbaaga Marudhalikkappaduvaan.
10 evanaagilum Manushakumaaranukku Virodhamaana Viseshaththaich Sonnaal Adhu Avanukku Mannikkappadum; Parisuththa Aavikku Virodhamaaith Dhooshanansollugiravanukko Mannikkappaduvadhillai.

11 andriyum, Jebaaalayaththalaivargalukkum Thuraiththanaththaargalukkum Adhigaaramullavargalukkum Munbaaga Ungalaik Kondupoi Vidumpodhu: Eppadi, Ennaththai Maaruththaramaagach Solluvom Endrum, Edhaip Pesuvomendrum Kavalaippadaadhirungal.
12 neengal Pesavendiyavaigalaip Parisuththa Aaviyaanavar Anneraththile Ungalukkup Bodhippaar Endraar.
13 appozhudhu Janakkoottaththil Oruvan Avarai Nokki: Podhagare, Aasthiyaip Paagampiriththu En Veedhaththai Enakkuth Tharumpadi En Sagodharanukkuk Kattalaiyidavendum Endru Kettukkondaan.
14 adharku Avar: Manushane, Ennai Ungalukku Niyaayaadhipadhiyaagavum Pangidugiravanaagavum Vaiththavan Yaar Endraar.
15 pinbu Avar Avargalai Nokki: Porulaasaiyaikkuriththu Echcharikkaiyaayirungal; Enenil Oruvanukku Evvalavu Thiralaana Aasthi Irundhaalum Adhu Avanukku Jeevan Alla Endraar.
16 allaamalum, Oru Uvamaiyai Avargalukkuch Sonnaar: Aisuvariyamulla Oruvanudaiya Nilam Nandraai Vilaindhadhu.
17 appozhudhu Avan: Naan Enna Seyven? En Dhaaniyangalaich Serththu Vaikkiradharku Idamillaiye;
18 naan Ondru Seyven, En Kalanjiyangalai Idiththu, Peridhaagak Katti, Enakku Vilaindha Thaaniyaththaiyum En Porulgalaiyum Ange Serththu Vaiththu,

19 pinbu: Aaththumaave, Unakkaaga Anega Varushangalukku Anegam Porulgal Serththuvaikkappattirukkiradhu; Nee Ilaippaari, Pusiththuk Kudiththu, Poorippaayiru Endru En Aaththumaavode Solluven Endru Thanakkulle Sindhiththuch Sollikkondaan.
20 dhevano Avanai Nokki: Madhikedane, Un Aaththumaa Unnidaththilirundhu Indha Raaththiriyile Eduththuk Kollappadum, Appozhudhu Nee Segariththavaigal Yaarudaiyadhaagum Endraar.
21 dhevanidaththil Aisuvariyavaanaayiraamal, Thanakkaagave Pokkishangalaich Serththuvaikkiravan Ippadiye Irukkiraan Endraar.

22 pinnum Avar Thammudaiya Seesharai Nokki: Ippadiyirukkirabadiyinaal, Ennaththai Unbom Endru Ungal Jeevanukkaagavum, Ennaththai Uduppom Endru Ungal Sareeraththukkaagavum Kavalaippadaadhirungal Endru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.
23 aagaaraththaippaarkkilum Jeevanum, Udaiyaippaarkkilum Sareeramum Viseshiththavaigalaayirukkiradhu .

24 kaagangalaik Gavaniththuppaarungal, Avaigal Vidhaikkiradhumillai Arukkiradhumillai, Avaigalukkup Pandasaalaiyumillai, Kalanjiyamumillai, Illaavittaalum Avaigalaiyum Dhevan Pizhaippoottugiraar; Paravaigalaippaarkkilum Neengal Evvalavo Viseshiththavargalaayirukkireergal.
25 kavalaippadugiradhinaal Ungalil Evan Than Sareera Alavodu Oru Muzhaththaik Koottuvaan.
26 migavum Arpamaana Kaariyamudhalaai Ungalaal Seyyakkoodaadhirukka, Matravaigalukkaaga Neengal Kavalaippadugiradhenna?

27 kaattuppushpangal Eppadi Valarugiradhendru Kavaniththuppaarungal; Avaigal Uzhaikkiradhumillai, Noorkiradhumillai, Endraalum Saalomon Mudhalaai Than Sarva Magimaiyilum Avaigalil Ondraippolaagilum Uduththiyirundhadhillai Endru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.
28 ippadiyirukka, Arpavisuvaasigale, Indraikkuk Kaattilirundhu Naalaikku Aduppile Podappadugira Pullukku Dhevan Ivvidhamaaga Uduththuviththaal, Ungalukku Uduththuvippadhu Adhiga Nichchayamallavaa?
29 aagaiyaal, Ennaththai Unpom, Ennaththaik Kudippom Endru, Neengal Kelaamalum Sandhegappadaamalum Irungal.
30 ivaigalaiyellaam Ulagaththaar Naadith Thedugiraargal; Ivaigal Ungalukku Vendiyavaigalendru Ungal Pidhaavaanavar Arindhirukkiraar.
31 dhevanudaiya Raajyaththaiye Thedungal, Appozhudhu Ivaigalellaam Ungalukkuk Koodak Kodukkappadum.
32 bayappadaadhe Sirumandhaiye, Ungalukku Raajyaththaik Kodukka Ungalpidhaa Piriyamaayirukkiraar.

33 ungalukku Ullavaigalai Vitrup Pichchaikodungal, Pazhamaiyaaip Pogaadha Panappaigalaiyum Kuraiyaadha Pokkishaththaiyum Paralogaththile Ungalukkuch Sampaadhiththuvaiyungal, Ange Thirudan Anugugiradhumillai, Poochchi Kedukkiradhumillai.
34 ungal Pokkisham Enge Irukkiradho Ange Ungal Irudhayamum Irukkum.
35 ungal Araigal Kattappattadhaagavum, Ungal Vilakkugal Erigiradhaagavum,
36 thangal Ejamaan Kaliyaanaththilirundhu Vandhu Thattumbodhu, Udane Avarukkuth Thirakkumpadi Eppozhudhu Varuvaar Endru Kaaththirukkira Manusharukku Oppaagavum Irungal.

37 ejamaan Varumpodhu, Vizhiththirukkiravargalaagak Kaanappadugira Oozhiyakkaarare Baakkiyavaangal. Avar Arai Kattikkondu, Avargalaip Pandhiyirukkachseydhu, Sameebamaai Vandhu, Avargalukku Oozhiyanjeyvaar Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.
38 avar Irandaam Jaamaththilaavadhu Moondraam Jaamaththilaavadhu Vandhu, Avargal Appadiye Irukkakkandaal, Avvoozhiyakkaarar Baakkiyavaangal.
39 thirudan Inna Neraththil Varuvaanendru Veettejamaanukkuth Therindhirundhaal, Avan Vizhiththirundhu, Than Veettaik Kannamidavottaan Endru Arindhirukkireergal.
40 andhappadiye Neengal Ninaiyaadha Neraththil Manushakumaaran Varuvaar, Aagaiyaal Neengalum Aayaththamaayirungal Endraar.
41 appozhudhu Pedhuru Avarai Nokki: Aandavare, Indha Uvamaiyai Engalukkumaaththiram Sollugireero, Ellaarukkum Sollugireero Endru Kettaan.
42 adharkuk Karththar: Panividaikkaararukkuth Thagudhiyaana Kaalaththile Padikodukkumbadi Ejamaan Avargal Mel Adhigaariyaaga Vaikkaththakka Unmaiyum Vivegamumulla Visaaranaikkaaran Yaavan?
43 ejamaan Varumpodhu Appadiye Seygiravanaaik Kaanappadugira Oozhiyakkaaran Baakkiyavaan.
44 thanakkulladhellaavatrinmelum Avanai Visaaranaikkaaranaaga Vaippaan Endru Meyyaagave Ungalukkuch Solgiren.
45 andha Oozhiyakkaarano, En Ejamaan Vara Naal Sellum Endru Thanakkulle Sollikkondu, Velaikkaararaiyum Velaikkaarigalaiyum Adikkavum, Pusiththuk Kudiththu Verikkavum Thalaippattaal,
46 avan Ninaiyaadha Naalilum, Ariyaadha Neraththilum, Andha Oozhiyakkaaranudaiya Ejamaan Vandhu, Avanaik Kadinamaaith Dhandiththu, Unmaiyillaadhavargalode Avanukkup Pangai Niyamippaan.
47 than Ejamaanudaiya Siththaththai Arindhum Aayaththamaayiraamalum, Avanudaiya Siththaththinbadi Seyyaamalum Irundha Oozhiyakkaaran Anega Adigal Adikkappaduvaan

48 ariyaadhavanaayirundhu, Adigalukku Edhuvaanavaigalaich Seydhavano Sila Adigal Adikkappaduvaan. Evanidaththil Adhigang Kodukkappadugiradho Avanidaththil Adhigang Ketkappadum; Manushar Evanidaththil Adhigamaai Oppuvikkiraargalo Avanidaththil Adhigamaaik Ketpaargal
49 boomiyinmel Akkiniyaip Poda Vandhen, Adhu Ippozhudhe Patri Eriya Vendumendru Virumbugiren.
50 aagilum Naan Muzhugavendiya Oru Snaanamundu, Adhu Mudiyumalavum Evvalavo Nerukkappadugiren.
51 naan Boomiyile Samaadhaanaththai Undaakka Vandhen Endru Ninaikkireergalo? Samaadhaanaththaiyalla, Pirivinaiyaiye Undaakka Vandhen Endru Ungalukkuch Sollugiren.
52 eppadiyenil, Idhumudhal Ore Veettile Aindhuper Pirindhiruppaargal, Iranduperukku Virodhamaai Moondruperum, Moondruperukku Virodhamaai Iranduperum Pirindhiruppaargal.
53 thagappan Maganukkum Magan Thagappanukkum, Thaai Magalukkum Magal Thaaikkum, Maami Marumagalukkum Marumagal Maamikkum Virodhamaaip Pirindhiruppaargal Endraar.
54 pinbu Avar Janangalai Nokki: Merke Megam Ezhumbugiradhai Neengal Kaanumpodhu, Mazhai Varumendru Sollugireergal; Andhappadiyumaagum.
55 thendral Adikkiradhai Neengal Kaanumpodhu Ushnam Undaagumendru Sollugireergal, Andhappadiyumaagum.
56 maayakkaarare, Boomiyin Thotraththaiyum Vaanaththin Thotraththaiyum Nidhaanikka Ungalukkuth Theriyume, Indhak Kaalaththaiyo Nidhaaniyaamarpogiradhenna?
57 niyaayam Innadhendru Neengale Theermaaniyaamalirukkiradhenna?

58 unakku Edhiraaliyaanavan Unnai Adhigaariyinidaththirkuk Kondupogirapodhu, Vazhiyiledhaane Avanidaththilirundhu Vidudhalaiyaagumpadi Pirayaasappatu, Illaavittaal, Avan Unnai Niyaayaadhipadhikku Munbaagak Kondupovaan, Niyaayaadhibadhi Unnaich Sevaganidaththil Oppukkoduppaan, Sevagan Unnaich Siraichchaalaiyil Poduvaan.
59 nee Kadaisikkaasaik Koduththuth Theerkkumattum, Avvidaththilirundhu Purappadamaattaai Endru Unakkuch Sollugiren Endraar.
